thread.title_full: Emmerdale spoilers: Devastating new pictures show the start of Ashley’s death as he collapses

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Emmerdale spoilers: Devastating new pictures show the start of Ashley’s death as he collapses
text:
(Picture: ITV) This is the devastating moment that sees Emmerdale trigger the heartbreaking final chapter for Ashley Thomas tonight. While the much loved character is jovially singing and dancing at the care home with his friend Bob Hope, he suddenly starts coughing up blood and falls to the floor. 
As a panicked Bob rushes to Ashley’s aid and calls for help, fans will know that this is the beginning of the end as Ashley is set to pass away next week in scenes that will leave viewers distraught.
(Picture: ITV) The powerful storyline around Ashley’s dementia has been running for over a year and has seen stunning writing and performances highlight the cruel and tragic illness.
As Laurel hears what has happened to her husband, she is forced to brace herself for the worst as Ashley ends up in a critical condition following his collapse and next week’s scenes will see her accept that she is set to lose her husband for good as she takes him home to spend his final days with loved ones.
PROMO: To have something that makes saying goodbye so hard is a life lived… #ByeAshley #Emmerdale https://t.co/cQaNhqDMAn pic.twitter.com/ehsacuBAAG 
— Emmerdale (@emmerdale) March 29, 2017 

Emmerdale airs Ashley’s collapse in an emotional double episode tonight at 7pm and 8pm on ITV.
